certifications.name: CSA
certifications.description: The ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA) certification validates your ability to configure, implement, and maintain ServiceNow instances. This entry-level certification is the foundation for all other ServiceNow certifications.
prerequisites: Access to a Personal Developer Instance (PDI)

domains.name: User Interface & Navigation
domains.description: Understanding the ServiceNow user interface, navigation, lists, forms, and platform overview

domains.name: User Administration & Security
domains.description: Managing users, groups, roles, and access controls (ACLs)

domains.name: Database Administration
domains.description: Working with tables, fields, data dictionary, and data management

domains.name: Self-Service & Automation
domains.description: Service Catalog, Knowledge Management, Flow Designer, and automation tools

domains.name: Incident Management
domains.description: Creating, managing, and resolving incidents following ITIL best practices

domains.name: Problem Management
domains.description: Root cause analysis, known errors, and problem resolution

domains.name: Change Management
domains.description: Change requests, change models, CAB approval, and change schedules

domains.name: Reporting & Dashboards
domains.description: Creating reports, dashboards, Performance Analytics, and data visualization

certifications.name: CAD
certifications.description: The ServiceNow Certified Application Developer (CAD) certification demonstrates your ability to build, customize, and extend applications on the ServiceNow platform using scripting and development tools.

domains.name: Scripting & APIs
domains.description: GlideRecord, GlideSystem, GlideAjax, and server-side scripting

domains.name: Business Rules
domains.description: Creating and managing business rules for server-side automation

domains.name: Client Scripts
domains.description: Client-side scripting for form customization and user experience

domains.name: UI Policies & Actions
domains.description: Dynamically changing form behavior without scripting

domains.name: Script Includes
domains.description: Reusable server-side JavaScript libraries

domains.name: Integration & REST APIs
domains.description: REST APIs, web services, and external integrations

domains.name: Application Development
domains.description: Studio, scoped applications, and update sets

certifications.name: CTA
certifications.description: The ServiceNow Certified Technical Architect (CTA) certification is an advanced certification for technical architects designing enterprise ServiceNow solutions. This expert-level certification validates comprehensive platform knowledge and solution architecture skills.

certifications.name: CPOA
certifications.description: The ServiceNow Certified Platform Owner Associate (CPOA) certification validates understanding of platform governance, strategy, and management. This certification is designed for those responsible for overseeing the ServiceNow platform within their organization.
prerequisites: Experience in platform governance and strategy

certifications.name: CIS-DF
certifications.description: The CIS-DF certification validates your expertise in CMDB and Common Service Data Model (CSDM) fundamentals. This certification is now a required prerequisite for multiple CIS certifications including CIS-ITSM, CIS-HAM, CIS-SAM, CIS-Discovery, CIS-SM, CIS-SIR, and CIS-VR.
prerequisites: Familiarity with Common Service Data Model (CSDM)

domains.name: Configuration
domains.description: Build and manage CMDB schema, identifiers, and reconciliation

domains.name: Ingest
domains.description: Import, normalize, and reconcile CI data with IRE and Service Graph Connectors

domains.name: Govern
domains.description: Apply health KPIs, governance processes, and lifecycle controls for trusted data

domains.name: Insight
domains.description: Use Query Builder, dashboards, and Unified Map for reporting and impact analysis

domains.name: CSDM Fundamentals
domains.description: Apply the Common Service Data Model to services across the lifecycle

certifications.name: CIS-ITSM
certifications.fullName: Certified Implementation Specialist - IT Service Management
certifications.description: The CIS-ITSM certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow IT Service Management solutions including Incident, Problem, Change, and Request Management.

domains.name: ITSM Overview
domains.description: ITSM fundamentals, ITIL alignment, and module relationships

domains.name: Incident Management
domains.description: Advanced incident configuration, major incidents, and escalations

domains.name: Problem Management
domains.description: Problem analysis, known error management, and workarounds

domains.name: Change Management
domains.description: Standard/normal/emergency changes, CAB, and risk assessment

domains.name: Request Management
domains.description: Service requests, catalog items, and fulfillment workflows

domains.name: SLA Management
domains.description: SLA definitions, schedules, and breach handling

domains.name: Reporting & Metrics
domains.description: ITSM reports, KPIs, and Performance Analytics

certifications.name: CIS-CSM
certifications.fullName: Certified Implementation Specialist - Customer Service Management
certifications.description: The CIS-CSM certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Customer Service Management solutions, including case management, customer portals, and customer service workflows.
prerequisites: Understanding of customer service best practices

certifications.name: CIS-FSM
certifications.fullName: Certified Implementation Specialist - Field Service Management
certifications.description: The CIS-FSM certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Field Service Management solutions, including work orders, dispatch, and field technician management.

certifications.name: CIS-HR
certifications.description: The CIS-HR certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow HR Service Delivery applications, including employee service center, case management, and HR workflows.

certifications.name: CIS-Discovery
certifications.description: The CIS-Discovery certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Discovery for infrastructure mapping, including configuration item discovery, credentials, and patterns.

certifications.name: CIS-SM
certifications.description: The CIS-SM certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Service Mapping for application dependency visualization, including service maps, patterns, and CI relationships.

certifications.name: CIS-EM
certifications.description: The CIS-EM certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Event Management, including event rules, alert management, and correlation.

certifications.name: CIS-VR
certifications.description: The CIS-VR certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Vulnerability Response for vulnerability management and remediation workflows.

certifications.name: CIS-SIR
certifications.fullName: Certified Implementation Specialist - Security Incident Response
certifications.description: The CIS-SIR certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Security Incident Response workflows, including threat intelligence, incident analysis, and security orchestration.

certifications.name: CIS-RC
certifications.fullName: Certified Implementation Specialist - Risk and Compliance
certifications.description: The CIS-RC certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Integrated Risk Management and Compliance solutions for risk assessment, controls, and audit management.
prerequisites: Understanding of risk and compliance frameworks

certifications.name: CIS-TPRM
certifications.fullName: Certified Implementation Specialist - Third-Party Risk Management
certifications.description: The CIS-TPRM certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Third-Party Risk Management solutions for comprehensive third-party risk assessment and monitoring.

certifications.name: CIS-SAM
certifications.fullName: Certified Implementation Specialist - Software Asset Management
certifications.description: The CIS-SAM certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Software Asset Management for license compliance, software metering, and optimization.
prerequisites: Understanding of license models and compliance

certifications.name: CIS-HAM
certifications.fullName: Certified Implementation Specialist - Hardware Asset Management
certifications.description: The CIS-HAM certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Hardware Asset Management for asset lifecycle management, procurement, and disposal.

certifications.name: CIS-SPM
certifications.fullName: Certified Implementation Specialist - Strategic Portfolio Management
certifications.description: The CIS-SPM certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Strategic Portfolio Management (formerly ITBM) for portfolio planning, demand management, and resource optimization.
prerequisites: Understanding of project and portfolio management

certifications.name: CIS-SP
certifications.description: The CIS-SP certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Service Provider solutions for multi-tenancy, managed services, and service provider operations.

certifications.name: CIS-PA
certifications.description: The CIS-PA certification validates your expertise in implementing ServiceNow Platform Analytics for dashboards, reporting, performance indicators, and data-driven insights across the platform.
